pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 26  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 6, Poison $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Overworld at light level 0, $(l:world/structures#hut)Witch Huts$(), Raids, when a $(l:creature/human-villager)$(thing)Villager$() is striked by a lightning bolt $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Witches$() are 85% resistant to some magical damage sources. $(br)They can trow $(l:brewing/potion_types#splash_potion)$(item)Splash Potions$() to to negatively enchant the opponent. $(br)They can heal themself.

$(n)Drops:$() 4-8 Redstone, chance for 0-2: Glass Bottles / Glowstone Dust / Gunpowder / Spider Eyes / Sugar / Sticks, 8.5% chance for it's $(l:brewing/potion_types#potion)Potion$() if killed when drinking $(br)$(n)XP:$() 5
